summary: Completed testing of AMC Onboarding Wizard Enhancement features. All 13 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend UI verified for all 8 wizard steps, conditional fields (Static IP, VPN, Password Manager), multi-sheet Excel template generation, and Save Draft persistence.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/portal/onboarding/device-template (no categories) - returns all 9 category sheets + Instructions
Backend: GET /api/portal/onboarding/device-template?categories=desktops,laptops,printers - returns only selected sheets
Backend: GET /api/portal/onboarding/device-template?categories=servers - single category returns 2 sheets
Backend: Device template sheet headers are correct (12 columns)
Backend: Device template sample data row present with correct values
Backend: GET /api/portal/onboarding - returns onboarding data with status and current_step
Backend: PUT /api/portal/onboarding - updates step3_device_categories correctly
Backend: PUT /api/portal/onboarding - updates step5_network_infra with has_static_ip and static_ip_addresses
Backend: PUT /api/portal/onboarding - updates step6_software_access with has_vpn/vpn_type and has_password_manager/password_manager_name
Backend: Save draft persists data correctly (verified with GET after PUT)
Backend: POST /api/portal/onboarding/upload-devices - normalizes Excel column names to snake_case
Backend: GET /api/admin/onboardings - lists all onboardings
Backend: GET /api/admin/onboardings?status=draft - filters by status
Frontend: All 8 wizard steps accessible and navigable
Frontend: Step 3 - Device Categories shows all 9 category checkboxes
Frontend: Step 4 - Device Inventory shows Download Template, Import Excel, Add Device buttons
Frontend: Step 5 - Has Static IP checkbox shows/hides Static IP Address(es) field (conditional)
Frontend: Step 6 - Uses VPN checkbox shows/hides VPN Type / Provider field (conditional)
Frontend: Step 6 - Uses Password Manager checkbox shows/hides Password Manager field (conditional)
Frontend: Save Draft button works and shows 'Draft saved' toast
Frontend: Data persists after page refresh (VPN, Password Manager values verified)
Frontend: Step 8 - Scope Confirmation shows all guardrail checkboxes
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_amc_onboarding.py - Created new test file for AMC Onboarding features
context_for_next_testing_agent: AMC Onboarding Wizard Enhancement fully tested. All 8 steps work correctly. Conditional fields in Step 5 (has_static_ip -> static_ip_addresses) and Step 6 (has_vpn -> vpn_type, has_password_manager -> password_manager_name) are working. Multi-sheet Excel template generation with category-specific tabs is working. Save Draft persists data correctly. Test file /app/backend/tests/test_amc_onboarding.py covers all backend APIs.
